headline: Kid's Drawing Won't Let Mom Ever Forget Her Parenting Fail
short descr: And so, dear mom who misplaced her child while shopping: at least kiddo was having a good time. As for a best memory? Someone
article: Any parent who has  misplaced his or her child likely wants to erase that memory forever. Once said child is back in your arms, there is no way you're going back to that horrible dark panicky place. That is, unless the little one decides to immortalize your parenting low point as art.And so, dear mom who misplaced her child while shopping: at least kiddo was having a good time. As for a best memory? Someone needs to get this child to Disney World, stat. (h/t failblog.org)Has your child written a hilarious note? Drawn an amusing photo? Click through the gallery below and add your own!
